definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: In the days when Hays was President, the White House was still a small crowded place.
sentences.chinese: 海斯任总统时，白宫还是个又小又挤的地方。

sentences.english: Hayes' horse fell abreast of his father's.
sentences.chinese: 海斯和他父亲骑马并肩而行。

sentences.english: The Hays Code remained officially in force until 1966.
sentences.chinese: 直到1966年，海斯法典皆生效。

sentences.english: But something new Hayes did learn in this study really surprised him.
sentences.chinese: 但是海斯在这个研究中的新发现的确令他感到吃惊。

sentences.english: Heisler is adapting to keep his clients.
sentences.chinese: 海斯勒比较擅长留住顾客。

sentences.english: Ruud Hesp was my neighbour and Overmars lived in my street too.
sentences.chinese: 海斯普是我的邻居，奥维马斯也在那条街上。

sentences.english: Name the last five Heisman Trophy winners.
sentences.chinese: 列出海斯曼奖杯最近的五名得主。

sentences.english: I think a Shay, a Climax and a Heisler would make a really nice stable.
sentences.chinese: 我认为谢伊，高潮和海斯勒将使一个非常好的稳定。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
Edwin Hubble (1889-1953), US astronomer/Fritz Haber (1868-1934), German chemist
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
